## AABB.getClipStateMask() method

Do a clip test at the AABB and a frustum.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getClipStateMask(viewProjMatrix: Matrix4x4, mask: number): ClipState;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  viewProjMatrix | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | The view projection matrix of the frustum. |
|  mask | number | The frustum planes that needs to be tested. |

**Returns:**

[ClipState](doc/markdown/./base.clipstate.md)

The clip test result.
